RootLayout.description: Starter code for your Nextjs Boilerplate with Tailwind CSS

Todos.meta_description: Manage your tasks with this simple todo list
Todos.title: Todo List
Todos.description: A simple feature-based todo list example

Index.meta_description: A production-ready Next.js template with feature-based architecture, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and best practices.
Index.welcome_subtitle: Production-ready boilerplate with clean architecture and developer-friendly structure
Index.features_description: Everything you need to build a modern web application
Index.architecture_description: Organized by features, not by file types. Each feature is self-contained with its own components, hooks, types, and utilities.
Index.i18n_description: Built-in multi-language support with next-intl. Easy to add new languages.
Index.quick_start_description: Get started building your application in 3 simple steps
Index.step_1_description: Organize your code by domain/feature. Keep related code together.
Index.step_2_description: Create pages in the app router that use your features.
Index.step_3_description: Import and use your features anywhere in your application.
Index.example_description: See a complete example of the feature-based architecture in action
Index.todo_example_description: A fully-functional Todo List demonstrating components, hooks, types, and utilities organized in a feature.
Index.features_guide_desc: Learn how to create and organize features
Index.cta_description: Start by exploring the example or dive into the documentation

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.
